title: NFL ATL: Media Day roundup, Super Bowl XLVIII impressions
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Media Day roundup, Super Bowl XLVIII impressions
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- checks in live from Super Bowl XLVIII Media Day, reporting back on all of the biggest stars from the Denver Broncos and Seattle Seahawks.  The heroes also offer early reflections on the unique significance of this Super Bowl and reveal who they think might have an edge going into Sunday. Be sure to tune into Thursday's show, when the gang offers a full preview of Super Bowl XLVIII, and join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
